{{short description|2017 Mythopoeic Society conference}}
{{convention|image=|title=Mythcon 48|location=Champaign-Urbana, Illinois|organizer=[[Mythopoeic Society]]|dates=28 July - 31 July [[2017]]|attendees=|previous=[[Mythcon 47]]|next=[[Mythcon 49]]}}'''Mythcon 48''' was the forty-eighth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

* '''Theme:''' "All That Is Gold"
* '''Guests of Honor:''' William Fliss ([[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]] archivist), and Laura Schmidt (Tolkien archivist)
